Greetings,
I played the original gladiators demo some time back in 2000 -- =
I was
hooked! It's the perfect game!

I'm currently porting the source to a=
 3D version based on Ogre3D ...
hoping to keep it generally the same as the=
 original, except that it
would have an optional over-the-shoulder view (pr=
obably).

What's this I head of Gladiator Beyond Freedom? a new version?
so=
mething different? ...

I'll stop by again when I have something to show or=
 tell.
Nathanael
